description:

title: Welcome to The Vine, the newest luxury condo!
description:
Welcome to The Vine, the newest luxury condo development by Philadelphia’s premier developer, Stamm Development, located in the heart of Francisville, just north of bustling Fairmount Avenue. This gorgeous unit boasts an open layout with a large kitchen featuring plenty of cabinet and countertop space, a bright and airy living room, and a huge bedroom. With its large 11’ ceilings, 1A feels wide open and spacious. The kitchen is the heart of this home and is decked out with two-tone UltraCraft cabinets, pure white quartz countertops, Delta Trinsic matte black fixtures, and Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, making it a chef's dream come true. The generously appointed bedroom features custom-built closets, while the bathroom boasts a deep soaking tub, custom vanity, and sleek black matte fixtures. Modern conveniences such as smart thermostats and Latch Technology secured front entry systems are included in all residences, providing an added layer of security and convenience. The building also features an incredible rooftop deck for all residents to enjoy, a private trash/recycling room, bike storage, and a mail room.

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!
1343 Fitzwater St #301

title: Wonderful 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment*super conveniently location
description:
Welcome to 2031 S Juniper St #201! This is a wonderful 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment conveniently located in a building with an elevator! Features include hardwood floors, natural light, outdoor space, central a/c, and in-unit laundry. Enter into the common area with your kitchen to the left and living area to the right. Your modern kitchen boasts dark cabinetry, granite countertops, subway tile backsplash, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances. The L-shaped counter offers bar seating for added convenience and you'll have a small back patio for enjoying the warmer months! There are 2 sizable bedrooms with natural light. Your beautiful bathroom offers a vanity for storage, medicine cabinet, and full size shower / tub combo. There's stacked washer & dryer in a closet and central a/c to keep you comfortable all year long. Nestled at the bottom Passyunk Avenue and conveniently located between less than a block from Broad Street and Snyder Avenue. You'll have countless shopping, eating & drinking, and entertainment at your fingertips. Walkable to the Guerin Recreation Center, East Passyunk Community Recreation Center, public transportation bus routes, and the Snyder Station for the Broad Street Line through Center City to Temple University. Locally owned hotspots include Mike's BBQ, Juana Tamale, D'Emilio's Old World Ice Treats, Pistola's Del Sur, P'unk Burger, Illexotics, Termini Bros Bakery, and TONS.

title: Well-maintained luxurious 2160 sq. ft. home in NW Philadelphia
description:
Welcome to this well-maintained luxurious 4 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 1 half bath, 2160 sq. ft. home nestled in the Manayunk section of NW Philadelphia. Offering everything to its new tenant from comfort, style, and gorgeous custom finishing touches leaving nothing left to do but unpack. The entry welcomes you with new hardwood floors expanding throughout the house. The living room contains a custom interior stacked stone wall with a sleek modern fireplace.
☎️CALL NOW:📞📞📞  show contact info
📞📞📞
A fully remodeled kitchen looks out over the living room and dining room, maintaining the open concept floor plan with recessed lighting throughout this home. In the kitchen, you'll find level four granite countertops, a tiled backsplash, 42" self-closing cabinets with an incorporated wine rack, high-end stainless steel appliances, and multi-functional under-the-cabinet LED lighting. The second floor offers 3 spacious bedrooms with a remodeled hallway bathroom. The 3rd floor offers the master suite with a new master bath which includes a jacuzzi tub and a modern stall shower with high-grade finishes. The fully finished carpet floored basement can be used as an extra entertainment space, recreation area, or another bedroom. In the basement, you will also find the fairly new installed Heating & Cooling system, on-demand water heater, and storage space. Not to mention updated plumbing, new electrical box, and service at 200 amps that can take the extra load of appliances and today's electronics, new windows, and new roof on 2nd level, no worries for maintenance for the years to come. Also, an added feature is a spacious backyard with custom fencing for entertainment and barbecuing during the summer months. There is plenty of street parking available. Property is close to Main Street Manayunk for socializing, shopping, and dining, barely a mile away from City Line Ave business district and universities, close to Lincoln Drive and Schuykill River trail for exercise and recreation, and convenient access to public transportation(bus and rail line), close to schools. Schedule your showing soon!

title: This Stunning Corner and Rare Condo That is a Fully Renovated Find
description:
This stunning corner and rare condo that is a fully renovated find, with many luxurious upgrades such as quartz countertops and luxury flooring throughout is in the heart of Washington Square. Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit provides spacious living in the heart of vibrant Washington Sq West, with nearby theaters, fine dining, coffee shops, top medical centers, idyllic parks, and myriad shopping options that offer a high quality, convenient standard of living. With no other tenants on the floor, this special unit is very private. Upon entering, the main living space is airy and open, with lots of natural light from a wall of windows at the front and side, and window treatments that can be raised or lowered for added privacy. The entire condo features modern, engineered hardwood floors. The tasteful kitchen offers upgraded gray cabinetry, white quartz waterfall counters, stainless steel appliances, Calacatta tile backsplash, deep double sinks, under cabinet hidden outlets, a large appliance cubby, pantry, an extended peninsula with pendant lighting, and comfortable seating for two or more. The primary master suite features a large bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious full bathroom with designer tile, a glass-enclosed shower, and dual access pocket doors. The second bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The entry hall includes multiple closets for coats, a washer/ dryer hook-up space, an electric water heater, and the central HVAC. title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia
description:

The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Directly above find your own personal roof-deck with 360-degree views of the Philadelphia skyline, excellent for entertaining guests. Fully finished basement with bonus room with built in bookshelves and full bath. SmartHome Technology such as Nest Thermostats, Schlage Combo Deadbolts and RING Video Doorbells allow you to adjust temperature, let guests in and see who’s there from the convenience of your roof-deck, or anywhere in the world!
